name: flirtatiousness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of behaving as if you are sexually attracted to someone, especially not in a serious way: She claims that her flirtatiousness is unintentional. He replied with the flirtatiousness for which he was famous. See
flirtatious
More examplesFewer examplesShe responded with flirtatiousness to his remarks.There was something old-fashioned about his flirtatiousness.He was gently charming with just a hint of flirtatiousness in his manner.
